name: Generic Platformer TM
description:
Collect all the diamonds and get rich.
Avoid getting eaten by the ferocious monsters.

Play through 2 exciting levels full of diamonds and maybe some monsters.

Controls:
- Keyboard:
    WASD/Arrows move and jump
    Space to attack
- Gamepad:
    Left stick/d-pad move
    Playstation Cross/Xbox A/Nintendo B jump
    Playstation Square/Xbox X/Nintendo Y attack

Credits:
- Music
    https://jc-system.itch.io/music-for-videogames
- SFX
    https://murkje.itch.io/retro-sfx
- Sprites
    https://szadiart.itch.io/rocky-world-platformer-set
    https://anokolisa.itch.io/purple-bay
- Font
    https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram

Source code is MIT licensed.

A game for the Stop Waiting For Godot gamejam
